body.name: Cleo+Coco Natural Deodorant for Women & Men, Aluminum Free with Organic Coconut Oil, Activated Charcoal for 24-Hour Odor Protection and All-Day Performance, Made in the USA - Basil Mint 1.7oz

features: ALUMINUM FREE & SYNTHETIC FRAGRANCE FREE - This deodorant is safe for your whole family to use. It is made with no aluminums, no parabens and no phthalates keeping you odor free all day. It also keeps you smelling great without any potential hormone disrupting synthetic fragrances, scented only with pure essential oils.

24 HOUR ODOR PROTECTION - Cleo+Coco uses ingredients like charcoal, baking soda and magnesium to absorb odor causing agents, balancing your microbiome and leaving you odor free all day long. Also uses ingredients like plant based powders to absorb sweat and essential oils to leave an amazing refreshing scent.

GENTLE & EASY TO APPLY (NON IRRITATING AND NON STAINING) - Our aluminum free deodorant goes on clear and won’t stain your clothes. Creamy soft to apply, it instantly absorbs into your underarms without leaving a residue. Cleo+Coco Charcoal Natural deodorant can keep skin fresh all day long - even through a workout.
VEGAN & CRUELTY FREE - Cleo+Coco deodorant is vegan and cruelty free. At Cleo+Coco, we are committed to sustainability as our deodorants are packaged in Post-Consumer Recycled (PCR) material.

BASIL MINT SCENT - OUR ICONIC SCENTS SMELL AMAZING WITHOUT SYNTHETIC FRAGRANCE - TRULY CLEAN - A bold take on a classic herbaceous scent. Sweet basil grounds the fragrance and stimulates the senses while sharp peppermint and energizing orange add brightness. You’ll feel crisp, clean, and completely one with nature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this deodorant and the scent is great to me!
reviews.reviewText: I love the scent, glides nicely on.. no bad stuff. I have my mother hooked on this brand as well. Kind of smells like a citrus line of scent. Very pleasant to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this deodorant and haven’t used any other kind in over a year. I’ve bought the basil mint for my husband and I and it leaves us smelling great all day without any worries!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not long lasting
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to love this but it just did not work well for me. I felt like I had to keep reapplying throughout the day and was so self conscious of being stinky with this. I will not be purchasing again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells Great /Mint Basil
reviews.reviewText: The only other deodorant Im not allergic to is Dove Non Alluminum Cucumber Scent. I just wanted something that smells better and lasts longer.This definitely smells super good and cant wait to try the other scents. Plus Im not allergic to it 👏🏻🔥 It also lasts all day which is shocking because normally these types of deodorant do nothing.My only issue is with this the mint scent it does stain on white shirts. Have not tried to bleach it out yet. Will be trying other scents to see if its just the dye color on that one! With other color shirts its not noticeable. (update 4/28 was able to wash it out of white shirt with nobleach so confident bleach would removed it completely!)Also love the look of the applicator but the deodorant kind of melts over the top of it when it heats up to your skin. So then you have it oozing on the sides and have to wipe it on your armpits before you close the lid otherwise its super messy.ALL of that being said. I personally will be buying again. Im happy to find one Im not allergic too 🥳Update 5/22! Tried the vanilla scent also not allergic. 🔥 This smells sweeter than I was anticipating almost like a vanilla cream cicle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not work!
reviews.reviewText: The scent is great, but it does not work to deodorize. I think I sweat more with it on than not putting anything at all. And my armpits tingle too. I do not recommend this brand at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE CLEO COCO
reviews.reviewText: I love this brand, it is all natural and the only deodorant I will use now. This scent smells nice but isn't my favorite that they offer.This brand works the best of all natural deodorants. It will last long but some days I do have to reapply depending on how active i am. But I would rather have to reapply then apply aluminum chemical deodorants.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Charcoal scent, not great
reviews.reviewText: I was excited because the ingredients seem great but it just didn’t really work for me after 2 months of trying. I bought the unscented in order to avoid fragrance but it smells like play dough. It has to warm up or the application is rough, and it leaves a thick oily residue on all my clothes that looks like pit stains. I can’t get it to come off so far. It last for a little bit but as a busy girl, I get sweaty and it can’t handle more than 2 hours max. But what’s really a bummer is that it’s 12 dollars for a very small bottle, with messy packaging. Overall missed the mark for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Basil and mint scent will leave you smelling like spearmint
reviews.reviewText: I put this on and went for a walk. I kept smelling spearmint gum and I kept checking on my pockets wondering when I had purchased it. Turns out it was the deodorant! I smell delicious. But not everybody would want to smell like a chewed up piece of gum. I like wearing it because I find it really amusing. But if you have a normal sense of humor, you might not be so entertained.
